measure.CatchLine: Creates income tax credit for eligible costs of development of middle housing dwelling units that sell for price affordable to household with annual income between 80 percent and 120 percent of area median income.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Creates income tax credit for eligible costs of development of middle housing dwelling units that sell for price affordable to household with annual income between 80 percent and 120 percent of area median income. 
	Applies to tax years beginning on or after January 1, 2024, and before January 1, 2030. 
	Takes effect on 91st day following adjournment sine die.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to tax credits for development of affordable housing; creating new provisions; amending ORS 314.772 and 318.031; and prescribing an effective date.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to tax credits for development of affordable housing; prescribing an effective date.
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
Referred to Housing and Homelessness with subsequent referral to Tax Expenditures.
